general_store.description: As you come in, you see a short woman with platinum blonde hair and fox ears standing behind the counter. Hakkin looks up and smiles, her tail starting to slowly wag. She's clearly excited to see you, although you don't know if she's the same with all her customers.

hakkin_greet.description:
You walk up to the counter. When you arive, she says,

'Hey, nice to meet you! I'm Hakkin, I just opened up this store. It seems like we'll be neighbors, huh?'

After finishing her little spiel, she smiles again and holds out her hand for you to shake. She's short enough that she has to lean forward over the counter slightly to reach you. You shake her hand and she leans back.

'So, wanna buy something?'

hakkin_talk.description:
You ask her name.

She replies, 'I'm Hakkin! I run the general store in this city. If you want to know anything about what I'm selling, just ask. I might not look like it, but I've been a merchant for longer than you've been alive, so I know my stuff.'
